Package chess

Class ChessGameImp

java.lang.Object
chess.ChessGameImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
chess.ChessGame
public class ChessGameImp extends Object implements chess.ChessGame
This class represents the chess game. The board, pieces and rules are all found here.

    • kingAttacksKing

      public void kingAttacksKing(Collection<chess.ChessMove> listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing, chess.ChessPosition kingPos, chess.ChessGame.TeamColor kingColor, int newRow, int newCol)
      Helper function to see if a king can attack another king.
      Parameters:
      listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing - A list of ChessMoves. A list of moves that have king in check.
      kingPos - A ChessPosition object. The current location of the king.
      kingColor - A TeamColor object. The color of the king.
      newRow - An integer representing a row in the chess board.
      newCol - An integer representing a column in the chess board.

    • knightAttacksKing

      public void knightAttacksKing(Collection<chess.ChessMove> listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing, chess.ChessPosition kingPos, chess.ChessGame.TeamColor kingColor, int rowChanger, int colChanger)
      Function below checks if king can be put in check by a knight
      Parameters:
      listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing - A list of ChessMove objects that represent pieces who have king in check
      kingPos - ChessPosition Object. The King's current position
      kingColor - TeamColor object. The King's color
      rowChanger - An integer that represents a row the knight could be located in.

    • rookOrQueenAttacksKing

      public void rookOrQueenAttacksKing(Collection<chess.ChessMove> listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing, chess.ChessPosition kingPos, chess.ChessGame.TeamColor kingColor, int range, int colChanger, int rowChanger)
      Function below checks if the king is in check by a rook or a queen.
      Parameters:
      listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing - A list of ChessMove objects that represent pieces who have king in check
      kingPos - ChessPosition object. King's position.
      kingColor - TeamColor object. King's color
      range - An integer representing how far we check on the board for a piece.
      colChanger - An integer that represents whether we are going up, down or staying the same.
      rowChanger - An integer that represents whether we are going left, right or staying the same.

    • memberCanBlockOrCaptureAttacker

      public Collection<chess.ChessMove> memberCanBlockOrCaptureAttacker(Collection<chess.ChessMove> listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing, chess.ChessGame.TeamColor kingColor)
      Function that determines if there are any pieces that can attack a piece that has king in check or if there are any pieces that can block the path of the piece that has the king in check. All of this without compromising the safety of the king.
      Parameters:
      listOfMovesThatCanAttackKing - A list of ChessMove objects that represent pieces who have king in check.
      kingColor - TeamColor object. King's color.
      Returns:
      A list of ChessMove objects that represent team pieces who can move to make King safe.

      Parameters:
      setOfSpaces - A set of ChessPosition objects. Represents space between King and attacker.

      public void diagHelperHelper(Collection<chess.ChessPosition> setOfSpaces, chess.ChessPosition attackerS, int range, int rowChanger, int colChanger)
